languages.text: {n}На губах Владайма возникает жесткая улыбка.{/n} "Действительно, справедливо. Прощайте и будьте прокляты".
{n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. So long, and damn you all."
languages.original_text: {n}На губах Владайма возникает жесткая улыбка.{/n} "Действительно, справедливо. Прощайте и будьте прокляты".

traits.locale_text: {n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. Farewell and be damned."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. Farewell and be damned."

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆嘴角露出一丝冷笑。{/n}“行，很公平。永别了，愿虚空诅咒你们所有人。”
languages.original_text: {n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. So long, and damn you all."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆嘴角露出一丝冷笑。{/n}“行，很公平。永别了，愿虚空诅咒你。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムの口元に、固い笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「十分だ。さらば。そして、呪われるがいい」
languages.original_text: {n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. So long, and damn you all."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムの口元に、固い笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「十分だ。さらば。そして、呪われるがいい」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa severa aparece en los labios de Vladaym.{/n} «Muy bien. Adiós y que os den a todos».
languages.original_text: {n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. So long, and damn you all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa dura aparece en los labios de Vladaym.{/n} «Muy bien. Adiós, y que le den».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Ein hartes Lächeln erscheint auf Vladayms Lippen.{/n} "Also schön. Lebt wohl und seid verdammt."
languages.original_text: {n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. So long, and damn you all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein hartes Lächeln erscheint auf Vladayms Lippen.{/n} "Also schön. Lebt wohl und seid verdammt."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Un sourire dur se forme sur les lèvres de Vladaym.{/n} « C'est de bonne guerre. Adieu, et que le Warp vous emporte tous. »
languages.original_text: {n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. So long, and damn you all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire dur se forme sur les lèvres de Vladaym.{/n} « C'est de bonne guerre. Adieu, et que le Warp vous emporte. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın dudaklarında sert bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Kötülükle kalın, hepinize lanet olsun."
languages.original_text: {n}A harsh smile appears on Vladaym's lips.{/n} "Fair enough. So long, and damn you all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym'ın dudaklarında sert bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Hoşça kalın ve hepinize lanet olsun."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
